titleStmt.title: Grammatical drollery consisting of poems & songs wherein the rules of the nouns & verbs in the accendence are pleasantly made easy, for the benefit of any that delight in a tract of this nature / by W. Hickes.
titleStmt.author: Hickes, William, fl. 1671.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
